summary: A set of weapons that fits to the "Dwarven Black Bow of Fate".
descriptionHtml:
!!!Dragonborn is required!!!

A matching armor-set is now available!
It can be downloaded here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40096/?

As I first made my way through the Kagrumez trials, I did not expect
more from it, than from any other Dwemer-Dungeon: some dwemer metal, maybe some gold...
But then, as I got to the last chamber, there was the Dwarven Black Bow of Fate!

This bow and the fact that I´m a big fan of the Dwemer, inspired me to create a whole series
of Black Dwarven Weapons of Fate.

'Cause I think it´s boring to upload some weapons without a story, I made one up.
There are no quest-markers, but a book called The Black Dwemer Artifacts, which
is located at the last chamber of Kagrumez. I won´t tell you its exact location, but I´m sure you´ll
find it by yourself.

The quest itself will lead you through many dwarven ruins, to collect all the weapons.

Due to the legend, the weapons and their enchantments are very strong.

*This pack contains:

- Dwarven Black Dagger of Fate:

If target dies within 60 seconds fills a soul gem.
Has a chance to paralyze the target.
Does 30 Points of frost-damage to health and stamina.
Does 500x critical damage.

- Dwarven Black Sword of Fate:

If target dies within 60 seconds fills a soul gem.
50% chance to absorb 50 points of stamina.
Absorbs 70 points of health.
50% chance to do 50 points of shock damage to health and half as much to magicka.

- Dwarven Black War-Axe of Fate

If target dies within 60 seconds fills a soul gem.
50% chance to cause 100 points of fire damage.
Banishes daedra to Oblivion.
Ignores armor.

- Dwarven Black Mace of Fate

If target dies within 60 second fills a soul gem.
50% chance of dealing 50 points of fire and/or shock damage.
Does 70 points of magicka damage.

- Dwarven Black Greatsword of Fate

50% chance to absorb 150 points of stamina.
50% chance to do 70 points of shock damage to health and half as much to magicka.
Absorbs 30 points of health.

- Dwarven Black Battleaxe of Fate

Absorbs 100 points of stamina.
50% chance to deal 30 points of fire damage.
Fully drains the target´s magicka.
Banishes daedra to oblivion.

- Dwarven Black Warhammer of Fate

50% chance to absorb 100 Points of health.
50% chance to absorb 150 Points of stamina.
If target dies within 60 seconds fills a soul gem.
Causes 5 points of bleeding damage for 10 seconds.

- Dwarven Black Bow of Fate (Stronger glow and enchantment)

50% chance for each atribute to Absorb 100 Points of health, stamina and/or magicka.

- Dwarven Black Arrows of Fate

Explodes (70 points damage) and is extremely fast.

The white ornaments on the weapons change their brightness, just like the ones on the Dwarven Black Bow of Fate.

The weapons, without the enchantments, can also be forged. They require the Ebony- and the Dwarven-Smithing Perks.

Please report bugs in the comments.

Versions:
v1.2 (08/11/13):

-Minor fixes

v1.1 (08/06/13):

-Fixed tempering of Dwarven Black Bow

v1 (08/06/13):

-Release
author: Planet-X
